quest.name: Meeting the Neighbors
journal: Lady Laniaitte is eager to get to more important business.

Instead of listening to her expound at greater length, Lady Laniaitte would rather have you gain firsthand experience of the Vanu Vanu. To that end, she sends you to speak with Ser Marielle, who could use your assistance.

Though Ser Marielle describes the Vanu as birdmen, she is quick to clarify that they are nothing like the Ixal. She marks several locations on your map and bids you stand watch in case the Vanu are nearby.
As expected, you spy several Vanu during your patrol and are forced to drive them off. Report all that has transpired to Ser Marielle.
Another day, another foiled attack by the Vanu. Ser Marielle is somewhat disappointed to learn that your patrol was not uneventful, but glad that you had no difficulty dispatching your foes.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Now that Emmanellain is out of harm's way, we are free to discuss matters of actual import, such as our struggles with the Vanu Vanu.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: We first encountered the Vanu several years ago, when we had just begun to explore the Sea of Clouds. After an exchange of pleasantries and gifts, we received permission to construct a permanent lookout post.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: There was peace between our peoples for half a year, until suddenly, for reasons unknown, their attitudes towards us changed. They began to attack our foraging parties without provocation, forcing us to rely more heavily on supplies flown in from Ishgard.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: ...But words are no substitute for firsthand experience. Go and see Ser Marielle─she could use your assistance.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Rather than listening to me go on and on, I think you would benefit from firsthand experience with the Vanu. Speak with Ser Marielle─she'll be expecting you.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Surname, I presume? Lady Laniaitte told me you were coming.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: I hear tell you've never faced a Vanu before? Well, spend enough time on patrol and you're sure to cross paths with them eventually.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: These birdmen are native to the floating isles. I say “birdmen,” but they're not at all like the Ixal─unless that Ixal's mother was a gigas.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: Here, let me mark several locations on your map. If you discover any Vanu in these areas, kill or drive them away.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: For all I know, you may find nothing. If so, let us consider it an auspicious omen...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You steel yourself for a mighty struggle, yet find no Vanu lying in wait.

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: Finished with your patrol? Anything to report?

dialogue.name: MARIELLE
dialogue.text: Heh, maybe it was too much to hope for a day without a skirmish. At least I can take solace in the fact that Halone has blessed us with a mighty ally.
